description: Plugin to push metrics to OpenTSDB

Env.Description: OpenTSDB host address to send metric to
Env.Name: OPENTSDB_HOST

Env.Description: OpenTSDB port address to send metric to
Env.Name: OPENTSDB_PORT

Env.Description: Docker Host to access the engine
Env.Name: DOCKER_HOST

Env.Description: Prints OpenTSDB strings to logs, instead of sending it off
Env.Name: DRY_RUN
